requirements.summary: Ensure the admin UI supports unauthenticated access to /admin catalog CRUD after redeploy, with clear, retryable error states when the backend is unavailable.
acceptanceCriteria: In the redeployed build, a fresh browser session can open `/admin/categories`, create a category, edit it, and delete it without any login flow or "Unauthorized" errors.
In the redeployed build, a fresh browser session can open `/admin/products`, create a product, edit it, and delete it without any login flow or "Unauthorized" errors.
No admin-login route is required to perform the above actions.

file_operations.description: Add an admin-scoped React Query hook that uses the anonymous admin actor to call `healthCheck()` and expose a retryable status for the admin area (success expects English text "Running").

Wire the admin health-check hook into the admin shell UI to show a small, English status indicator (Running / Unavailable with Retry) so /admin routes never appear blank and failures remain retryable instead of crashing the route.
Ensure backend-unavailability detection and userMessage formatting remain English and are suitable for reuse by admin health-check + admin CRUD pages (retryable, no route-level crash messaging).

Update redeploy verification steps to explicitly confirm anonymous admin CRUD on `/admin/categories` and `/admin/products` in a fresh browser session, and to use the admin health indicator/healthCheck as the quick confirmation that the backend is running.
